name: Harold Tales - End C
description:
Plains. The Sea. Man. The stuff Loriesquare makes are so funny it essentially immortalized Harold into his position as a comedic goofball. But there’s also Eric, the start of it all. Y’know what? Plagiarism’s a coocoo claptrap.

I’m ripping it off. So let’s go and have some fun, Eric. I’m gonna play you like a freaking fiddle.

Though with his generic skillset, he’s gonna need a bit of help.

I’m gonna just.. Splice Harold up… and when he falls down I sync him up just like back then when we faced off the Trojan.

And then… a little bit of tampering… and add Orc’s Boarbro minion down.. The one that WANTS the double D that is.

Oh! Oh! Blocker Sheep! Let’s not forget that!

I’m gonna keep swearing to a minimum tho. I ain’t liking that S-bombs and F-wack putting in my world. Or… maybe I can juuuusssttt.. Circumvent it.

Then adjust my physical attributes and bam.

Alright! Ripoff game here we go!!

---------------

Controls

Z/Enter - Select

X/Esc - Cancel

Arrow Keys = Move
